subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: As Villanova’s losing streak grew to five with its loss in the Big East tournament, the questions surrounding the Wildcats, and their worthiness of an N.C.A.A. tournament bid, will only grow louder.
snippet: As Villanova’s losing streak grew to five with its loss in the Big East tournament, the questions surrounding the Wildcats, and their worthiness of an N.C.A.A. tournament bid, will only grow louder.
